<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Do extensive, expensive, basic correctness checking.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAGTypeLegalizer::PerformExpensiveChecks() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a node is not processed, then none of its values should be mapped by any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of PromotedIntegers, ExpandedIntegers, ..., ReplacedValues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a node is processed, then each value with an illegal type must be mapped</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by exactly one of PromotedIntegers, ExpandedIntegers, ..., ReplacedValues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Values with a legal type may be mapped by ReplacedValues, but not by any of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the other maps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that these invariants may not hold momentarily when processing a node:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the node being processed may be put in a map before being marked Processed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that it is possible to have nodes marked NewNode in the DAG.  This can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occur in two ways.  Firstly, a node may be created during legalization but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// never passed to the legalization core.  This is usually due to the implicit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// folding that occurs when using the DAG.getNode operators.  Secondly, a new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node may be passed to the legalization core, but when analyzed may morph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into a different node, leaving the original node as a NewNode in the DAG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A node may morph if one of its operands changes during analysis.  Whether</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it actually morphs or not depends on whether, after updating its operands,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it is equivalent to an existing node: if so, it morphs into that existing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node (CSE).  An operand can change during analysis if the operand is a new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node that morphs, or it is a processed value that was mapped to some other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value (as recorded in ReplacedValues) in which case the operand is turned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into that other value.  If a node morphs then the node it morphed into will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be used instead of it for legalization, however the original node continues</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to live on in the DAG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The conclusion is that though there may be nodes marked NewNode in the DAG,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all uses of such nodes are also marked NewNode: the result is a fungus of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewNodes growing on top of the useful nodes, and perhaps using them, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not used by them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a value is mapped by ReplacedValues, then it must have no uses, except</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by nodes marked NewNode (see above).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The final node obtained by mapping by ReplacedValues is not marked NewNode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that ReplacedValues should be applied iteratively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that the ReplacedValues map may also map deleted nodes (by iterating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// over the DAG we never dereference deleted nodes).  This means that it may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// also map nodes marked NewNode if the deallocated memory was reallocated as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// another node, and that new node was not seen by the LegalizeTypes machinery</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (for example because it was created but not used).  In general, we cannot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distinguish between new nodes and deleted nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;SDNode&#42;, 16&gt;</a> NewNodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> : DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#ab01e38173337b53d794086a134845c0d">allnodes</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember nodes marked NewNode - they are subject to extra checking below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>.getNodeId() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a8538ef2e6f2a154d8fb2032f068a3ed8">NewNode</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is the main entry point for the type legalizer. This does a top-down</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// traversal of the dag, legalizing types as it goes. Returns &quot;true&quot; if it made</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// any changes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#a39cafb39798d9b0f3b611b9ee0fff149"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#a39cafb39798d9b0f3b611b9ee0fff149">DAGTypeLegalizer::run</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a dummy node (which is not added to allnodes), that adds a reference</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the root node, preventing it from being deleted, and tracking any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// changes of the root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/handlesdnode">HandleSDNode</a> Dummy(DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a0b02716fe6bb52c384caec3a1f8268be">getRoot</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Dummy.setNodeId(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994acc58a6895ccc71b318f6eb9bd6a17ac2">Unanalyzed</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The root of the dag may dangle to deleted nodes until the type legalizer is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// done.  Set it to null to avoid confusion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#ae0fc3f54d06d2230bf93a19d45f51706">setRoot</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk all nodes in the graph, assigning them a NodeId of &#39;ReadyToProcess&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (and remembering them) if they are leaves and assigning &#39;Unanalyzed&#39; if</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNumValues() == M-&gt;getNumValues() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNumValues(); i != e; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replacing the value takes care of remapping the new value.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// grows on top of the useful nodes.  Nothing more needs to be done</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">NodeDone:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we reach here, the node was processed, potentially creating new nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark it as processed and add its users to the worklist as appropriate.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The specified node is the root of a subtree of potentially new nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Correct any processed operands (this may change the node) and calculate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// NodeId. If the node itself changes to a processed node, it is not remapped -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the caller needs to take care of this. Returns the potentially changed node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;DAGTypeLegalizer::AnalyzeNewNode(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this was an existing node that is already done, we&#39;re done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a8538ef2e6f2a154d8fb2032f068a3ed8">NewNode</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994acc58a6895ccc71b318f6eb9bd6a17ac2">Unanalyzed</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Okay, we know that this node is new.  Recursively walk all of its operands</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to see if they are new also.  The depth of this walk is bounded by the size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the new tree that was constructed (usually 2-3 nodes), so we don&#39;t worry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// about revisiting of nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As we walk the operands, keep track of the number of nodes that are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// processed.  If non-zero, this will become the new nodeid of this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Operands may morph when they are analyzed.  If so, the node will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// updated after all operands have been analyzed.  Since this is rare,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the code tries to minimize overhead in the non-morphing case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;SDValue&gt; NewOps;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumProcessed = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNumOperands(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> OrigOp = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> = OrigOp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AnalyzeNewValue(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Op may morph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getNode()-&gt;getNodeId() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994af6b7630aca04cca9a65516a381267417">Processed</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++NumProcessed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NewOps.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some previous operand changed.  Add this one to the list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewOps.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> != OrigOp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the first operand to change - add all operands so far.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewOps.insert(NewOps.end(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;op&#95;begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;op&#95;begin() + i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewOps.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some operands changed - update the node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NewOps.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SDNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a> = DAG.UpdateNodeOperands(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, NewOps);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The node morphed into a different node.  Normally for this to happen</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the original node would have to be marked NewNode.  However this can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in theory momentarily not be the case while ReplaceValueWith is doing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its stuff.  Mark the original node NewNode to help basic correctness</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// checking.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;setNodeId(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a8538ef2e6f2a154d8fb2032f068a3ed8">NewNode</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a8538ef2e6f2a154d8fb2032f068a3ed8">NewNode</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994acc58a6895ccc71b318f6eb9bd6a17ac2">Unanalyzed</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It morphed into a previously analyzed node - nothing more to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It morphed into a different new node.  Do the equivalent of passing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it to AnalyzeNewNode: expunge it and calculate the NodeId.  No need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to remap the operands, since they are the same as the operands we</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// target in a map, so note the replacement N -&gt; E in ReplacedValues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(E &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Node not replaced?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DTL.NoteDeletion(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, E);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In theory the deleted node could also have been scheduled for analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So remove it from the set of nodes which will be analyzed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NodesToAnalyze.remove(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In general nothing needs to be done for E, since it didn&#39;t change but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only gained new uses.  However N -&gt; E was just added to ReplacedValues,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the result of a ReplacedValues mapping is not allowed to be marked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewNode.  So if E is marked NewNode, then it needs to be analyzed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (E-&gt;getNodeId() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a8538ef2e6f2a154d8fb2032f068a3ed8">DAGTypeLegalizer::NewNode</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NodesToAnalyze.insert(E);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-legalizetypes-cpp-/nodeupdatelistener/#acf34249f3e61610c017c54e3445dda14"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-legalizetypes-cpp-/nodeupdatelistener/#acf34249f3e61610c017c54e3445dda14">NodeUpdated</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Node updates can mean pretty much anything.  It is possible that an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operand was set to something already processed (f.e.) in which case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this node could become ready.  Recompute its flags.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a5c4b2709df114f7ca7344a9e264ca9b8">DAGTypeLegalizer::ReadyToProcess</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994af6b7630aca04cca9a65516a381267417">DAGTypeLegalizer::Processed</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid node ID for RAUW deletion!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;setNodeId(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a8538ef2e6f2a154d8fb2032f068a3ed8">DAGTypeLegalizer::NewNode</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NodesToAnalyze.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The specified value was legalized to the specified other value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Update the DAG and NodeIds replacing any uses of From to use To instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAGTypeLegalizer::ReplaceValueWith(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> To) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(From.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>() != To.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Potential legalization loop!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If expansion produced new nodes, make sure they are properly marked.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AnalyzeNewValue(To);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Anything that used the old node should now use the new one.  Note that this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can potentially cause recursive merging.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallSetVector&lt;SDNode&#42;, 16&gt; NodesToAnalyze;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NodeUpdateListener NUL(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, NodesToAnalyze);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The old node may be present in a map like ExpandedIntegers or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PromotedIntegers. Inform maps about the replacement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FromId = getTableId(From);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ToId = getTableId(To);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FromId != ToId)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ReplacedValues&#91;FromId&#93; = ToId;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DAG.ReplaceAllUsesOfValueWith(From, To);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process the list of nodes that need to be reanalyzed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NodesToAnalyze.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#ac178f4fc4e4a0642610c374256b9fb27">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SDNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = NodesToAnalyze.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#af9880d625c506aacc716ee1c9a29ff8b">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a8538ef2e6f2a154d8fb2032f068a3ed8">DAGTypeLegalizer::NewNode</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The node was analyzed while reanalyzing an earlier node - it is safe</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to skip.  Note that this is not a morphing node - otherwise it would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// still be marked NewNode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Analyze the node&#39;s operands and recalculate the node ID.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SDNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a> = AnalyzeNewNode(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The node morphed into a different node.  Make everyone use the new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a8538ef2e6f2a154d8fb2032f068a3ed8">NewNode</a> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Analysis resulted in NewNode!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNumValues() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getNumValues() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNumValues(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> OldVal(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> NewVal(M, i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getNodeId() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994af6b7630aca04cca9a65516a381267417">Processed</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">            RemapValue(NewVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OldVal may be a target of the ReplacedValues map which was marked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewNode to force reanalysis because it was updated.  Ensure that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// anything that ReplacedValues mapped to OldVal will now be mapped</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all the way to NewVal.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">          DAG.ReplaceAllUsesOfValueWith(OldVal, NewVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OldValId != NewValId)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">            ReplacedValues&#91;OldValId&#93; = NewValId;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The original node continues to exist in the DAG, marked NewNode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When recursively update nodes with new nodes, it is possible to have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new uses of From due to CSE. If this happens, replace the new uses of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// From with To.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!From.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#aadec518817d351d77d1badd66cf96fc3">use&#95;empty</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the stack frame object.  Make sure it is aligned for both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the source and destination types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In cases where the vector is illegal it will be broken down into parts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and stored in parts - we should use the alignment for the smallest part.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> DestAlign = DAG.getReducedAlign(DestVT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;UseABI=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#aa8c11d016a2dd473a4cf0ed1da777f5eaf80f5476044d70697d689c8f32415ce9">StackPtr</a> =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAG.getLoad(DestVT, dl, Store, StackPtr, MachinePointerInfo(), Align);</span></CodeLine>
